query:
WITH prev_sd AS (
                DELETE FROM debounce_stale_data WHERE job_id = $1 RETURNING to_relock
            ) INSERT INTO debounce_stale_data (job_id, to_relock)
                VALUES ($2, array_cat((SELECT to_relock FROM prev_sd), $3))
                ON CONFLICT (job_id) DO UPDATE SET to_relock = EXCLUDED.to_relock
